name: Verlo_Skiff
content:
Verlo Skiff was a human male who served the law enforcement arm of Preox-Morlana on Morlana One. In 5 BBY, He and his partner Kravas Drezzer were drinking at a brothel in Morlana One's Leisure Zone when they spotted Cassian Andor, who was at the brothel in search of his sister. The pair later tailed Andor and attempted to rob him. However, Andor fought back, headbutting and accidentally caused Skiff's death before executing Drezzer despite the man begging for his life.
Verlo Skiff first appeared in the first episode of the Tony Gilroy's live-action Disney+ series Andor, directed by Toby Haynes and released on September 21, 2022. His last name is not stated in the episode, but is mentioned in Aurebesh in Syril Karn's report, which Chief Inspector Hyne reads on a datapad.
